subSubSection.paragraph: Status, sex and repository of types unknown ( Palma 2017: 35 ).

Remarks:
González-Acuña et al . (2011a: 302)
recorded
Actornithophilus piceus
with a low prevalence of infestation on two species of Chilean gulls.
